description: This file defines theme data for a Flutter application, including light and dark themes with specific color schemes and styling for UI components.

classes.name: AppThemes
classes.description: A class containing static definitions of color constants and theme data for light and dark themes.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static final ThemeData object representing the light theme of the app.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: A static final ThemeData object representing the dark theme of the app.
